Detailed Description

cvmx_srio::_rx_bell

This register contains the SRIO information, device ID, transaction type and priority of the incoming doorbell transaction as well as the number of transactions waiting to be read. Reading this register causes a doorbell to be removed from the RX Bell FIFO and the COUNT to be decremented. If the COUNT is zero then the FIFO is empty and the other fields should be considered invalid. When the FIFO is full an ERROR is automatically issued. The RXBELL Interrupt can be used to detect posts to this FIFO.

This register is reset by the h-clock reset.
